name: Lost foam casting, aluminum
description:
No co-product allocation for scrap materials that are recycled or reused; all environmental flows for scrap are included in the environmental flows for the product.
Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has 
undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet 
undergone a formal validation process.
Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: representative of lost foam aluminum casting technology.
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
